channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China launches its silver weapon on Jan. 1. What that means for investors and prices.
item.description: China controls around 70% of the silver that Big Tech, AI and solar power desperately need. Beijing is about to lock the gates.

item.title: Interest rates could be on hold ‘for some time,’ Fed minutes show
item.description: A pause would give Federal Reserve officials time to assess the effects of the three rate cuts made this year.

item.title: ‘So much for holiday cheer’: I saw a guest take a bottle of wine as they left a Christmas party. Do I tell the host?
item.description: “I guess he thought no one would notice. It came in a gift bag, and it looked expensive.”

item.title: This winning fund manager spills 4 secrets about smart ways to buy non-U.S. stocks
item.description: David Herro is an experienced guide to the global market.

item.title: I’m afraid my financial adviser will steal my money. I’ve read too many cautionary tales. How can I be sure?
item.description: “I am 66 years old and have been retired for about a year and a half.”

item.title: The risk-reward balance in Broadcom is too good to ignore. How to trade the chipmaker with options
item.description: Nishant Pant breaks down this bull call spread on AVGO.

item.title: Best and worst asset classes of 2025. Gold wins the year
item.description: Gold is this year's winner while oil and crypto have faced headwinds.

item.title: There was money to be made in 2025, even as some major stocks’ market caps ‘bled out,’ Josh Brown says
item.description: When some big tech names struggled, investors were able to rotate into pockets of strength outside of the sector, the CEO of Ritholtz Wealth Managemen...

item.title: Why bitcoin is ending 2025 with losses, and whether it can rebound in the new year
item.description: Bitcoin could gain ground in 2026, despite its poor performance this year, according to some analysts on Wall Street.

item.title: Mike Santoli's long-time 'Mystery Broker' source reveals himself. What he thinks about 2026
item.description: "Mystery Broker" joined CNBC's Michael Santoli on "Closing Bell" Tuesday, where MB's identity was revealed to be David Snyder.

item.title: Holy Ship! HII Stock Jumps on Trump Navy Ship Plans

item.title: DBVT Stock Rockets on Positive Peanut Allergy Patch Trial

item.title: Trump’s Weed Pivot Ignites CGC Stock Surge
item.description: Canopy Growth (CGC) surges 50%+ as Trump eyes marijuana reclassification. Explore the buzz, risks, and trading lessons in this volatile sector.
